content: Hey @rylev -- I was curious to hear a bit more about what you meant by the end being "thin" in wg-async-foundations#149

The last two sections mention issues but they're somewhat glossed over. I left some comments about how it wasn't clear to me what the nature of the issues that were encountered was. I think if those sections were expanded with more detail it would directly address the "thin" issue.
@nikomatsakis One tiny thing and I believe this can be merged.
